title: Furnished 1 Bedroom Steps Away from Lake, Loyola, and the Red Line
posting_body: ['Bright, Clean, Updated Condo Close to the Best of Rogers Park and Chicago', 'This', 'furnished home', 'is ideal for anyone moving to Chicago on a short-term contract.', 'Or anyone who plans a long-term move, but wants to get to know the city before deciding where to settle down.', 'All you need to bring are your clothes and personal items!', '• $1550 a month includes electric, gas, water, trash, and internet.', '• Available September 1, but earlier start is negotiable.', '• Minimum lease term is 10 months.', '• Credit/background check required.', '• Small pets considered for additional fee.', '(But for those with allergies, unit has been pet-free so far.)', 'UNIT DETAILS', 'Three Rooms: open living room includes full kitchen and office space, bedroom, and bathroom.', 'In-unit laundry', 'Central AC and Heat', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Dimmer Lights', 'Tall Ceilings', 'Lots of Windows', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'USB and USB-C outlets', 'Simple but stylish furnishings include:', 'Queen-Sized Bed', 'Comfy Couch', 'Two Air Chairs', 'Two Occasional Chairs', 'Desk', 'Rolling Ergonomic Office Chair', 'Bookshelves', 'Window Treatments', 'Basic Kitchen Tools', 'One set of Linens and Towels', 'BUILDING DETAILS', 'Smoke Free', 'Intercom Entry System', 'Security Cameras', 'Elevator Building', 'Bike Storage Room on the First Floor', 'Unzoned Street Parking', 'Indoor Parking Available to Rent 0.2 Miles Away', 'NEARBY', 'Red Line CTA Stop (Morse) — 0.1 miles', 'Glenwood Farmers Market (seasonal) — 0.1 miles', 'Lifeline Theater (live theater) — 0.1 miles', 'RP Social (cocktails) — 0.1 miles', 'Morse Market (groceries) — 0.2 miles', 'Le Piano (jazz club) — 0.2 miles', 'The New 400 Theater (movies) — 0.3 miles', 'The Common Cup (coffee) — 0.3 miles', 'Lake Michigan — 0.4 miles', 'Loyola University — 0.6 miles', 'A LITTLE FARTHER', 'Metropolis Coffee (local roaster): 1 mile', 'Whole Foods (in Edgewater) — 1.5 miles', 'Little India — 2 miles', 'Andersonville — 2 miles', 'Trader Joe’s (in Evanston) — 3.2 miles', 'Lincoln Square — 4 miles', 'Northwestern University — 4 miles', 'Montrose Point Bird Sanctuary — 4.5 miles', 'ALL OF CHICAGO', 'As one of the city’s primarily public transit arteries, CTA’s Red Line makes most of Chicago accessible immediately or via an easy connection.', 'Having a station steps away from your own front door means you’re also just steps away from:', 'Downtown Evanston (transfer to Purple Line)', 'Wrigley Field', 'DePaul University', 'Much of The Loop (downtown Chicago)', 'Art Institute of Chicago (the rapid bus will get you closer to the front door)', 'Guaranteed Rate Field (Comiskey forever)', 'Downtown Oak Park and all thing Frank Lloyd Wright (transfer to Green Line)', 'Midway Airport (transfer to the Orange Line)', 'O’Hare Airport (transfer to the Blue Line)']
